title: Peak power demand to touch 3.5 lakh MW by 2030-31, says Union Minister R K Singh
description: The minister said 27,180 MW of thermal capacity is under construction, 12,000 MW has been bid out and 19,000 MW is under clearances. The total anticipated thermal capacity addition by 2031-2032 will be 87,910 MW.
